thread.title: Get back to nature with Sunset Safari this summer at ZSL London ZooTravelandtourworld.com
thread.title_full: Get back to nature with Sunset Safari this summer at ZSL London ZooTravelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Get back to nature with Sunset Safari this summer at ZSL London ZooTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Get back to nature with Sunset Safari this summer at ZSL London Zoo Published on : Tuesday, July 14, 2015
Take a walk on the wild side at ZSL London Zoo, as you see the animals in a whole new light with Sunset Safari this summer.
Encounter zoo inhabitants as the sun goes down, offering a glimpse into their lives that only the keepers and other animals would normally only witness.
Catch the tigers prowling in the twilight or watch the giraffes turn in for the night as more than 750 fascinating animals prepare for their nightly adventures.
Choose between a self-guided tour of the safari trails or acquire the expert company of a safari guide, who can offer an informed trip around the grounds.
With tips on how to spot some of the more elusive species, acoustic guitar music sessions and the chance to witness rare feeding moments, this is the ideal way to get back to nature in London.
Source: visitlondon.com
